doc.summary: This is meant to be called in <ref cls="net/minecraftforge/client/event/RenderLevelLastEvent">RenderLevelLastEvent</ref>.
doc.text: This is meant to be called in RenderLevelLastEvent. This will move the pose stack to the given position in the world. Do not always use this with (0, 0, 0) and translate to the position you need afterwards as it will be buggy millions of blocks away because of rounding errors.
